alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Northampton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 2:58PM EST until February 28 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Warren and Morris. In Pennsylvania, Carbon and Northampton. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening or Tuesday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could exceed one inch per hour at times Monday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
